resources.string: What days do you want exercise ?

string-array.name: less_than_two
string-array.item: Chest: Press up on knees — Beginner — Body weight (NIL modifier)
Chest: Press up — Beginner — Body weight (NIL modifier)
Back: Machine row — Beginner — 0.3x modifier
Back: Lat pull down — Beginner — 0.3x modifier
Bicep: Seated alternating curl — Beginner — O.1x modifier
Bicep: Seated alternating hammer curl — Beginner — O.1x modifier
Triceps: Cable rope pushdown — Beginner — 0.3x modifier
Triceps: Chair dips — Beginner — Body weight (NIL modifier)
Legs: Air squats — Beginner — Body weight (NIL modifier)
Legs: Walking Lunges — Beginner — Body weight (NIL modifier)

Bicep: Rope hammer curl - Intermediate - 0.2x modifier

Triceps: Skull crusher - Intermediate - 0.1x modifier

string-array.name: more_than_three
string-array.item: Chest: Dumbbell fly - Experienced - 0.1 x modifier
